item.title: Outside our house, on the street, 14th September
item.description:
The council have left blue bags with leaves in directly outside our house for a week now (outside 38 Dyne Road) - and as a result it is now encouraging others to leave items (fly-tip) there - adding general rubbish to the same location! Please can you arrange for someone to attend to remove the bags of leaves and also remove any other fly tipped items (per the photo provided) as this will only get worse the longer that Brent council choose to leave their swept leaves there). Many thanks in advance,

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dyne Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flags graffitied onto the crossing., 14th September

item.title: Lighting not working and part of lighting hanging down, 14th September
item.description:
